hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

locations.Gerudo Training Ground Near Scarecrow Ch: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the path to #the Tower#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
